Title: Lola Montès
Writer: Jacques Laurent (based on the novel by: "La vie extraordinaire de Lola Montès"), Max Ophüls (scenario), Annette Wademant (adaptation), Max Ophüls (adaptation), Jacques Natanson (dialogue)
Actors: Martine Carol, Peter Ustinov, Anton Walbrook, Henri Guisol
Plot: When she is reduced to appearing in a circus, a notorious beauty thinks back on her past loves.
